user.description: Please select your printer and provide it's serial number.

Bambu.title: Bambu Cloud MQTT Connection
Bambu.description: Please provide your Bambu Lab credentials to allow generation of an authentication token. Only the token will be saved, your Bambu credentials will not.

Lan.title: Local MQTT Connection
Lan.description: Please provide your local printer IP address and access code. The access code can be found on the printer screen in the network settings.

init.title: Adjust connection settings
init.description: Choose the new connection settings for this printer.

Lan.title: Local MQTT Connection
